import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Grid, Card, Image, Rating, Button, Icon } from 'semantic-ui-react' import BookDetails from './BookDetails' export class BookCard extends Component { render() { return (
{this.props.book.volumeInfo.title} {this.props.book.volumeInfo.authors} {this.props.book.volumeInfo.ratingsCount} ratings {/* {/* */}
) } } export default BookCard
